name: Beef Bulgogi Lettuce Wraps
author: Elissa
summary: Set out the bulgogi meat, rice, lettuce, and dipping sauce and let everyone wrap the fixings into bundles.
ingredients: 1 head Boston lettuce, separated into leaves
directions: Freeze beef partially, until firm, about 1 hour
Slice across the grain into 1/2-inch slices
Combine 1/3 cup soy sauce, green onions, sake, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, sugar, garlic, ginger, and black pepper in a large bowl
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until sauce flavors are absorbed, 1 to 3 hours
Stir gochujang, 1 teaspoon soy sauce, and 1 teaspoon sesame oil together in a bowl
Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Arrange marinated beef on a rimmed baking sheet
Broil beef; stirring frequently, until glazed and dark brown, and nearly all marinade has evaporated, 15 to 20 minutes
Arrange cooked beef, rice, and cucumber in serving bowls
Wrap portions of each in lettuce and dip into the gochujang sauce
